```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r prio_table ,results='asis', echo=FALSE}

d <- memo_data()


kable(d$prio, "latex", booktabs = T,format.args = list(big.mark = ",")) %>%
  column_spec(1,width = "1.2in",bold=TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(2,width = "0.25in") %>% 
  column_spec(3:9, width = "0.6in") %>% 
  collapse_rows(columns = 1, latex_hline = "major", valign = "middle") %>% 
  kable_styling(font_size = 8)

  cat('\n\n')
  cat('\\pagebreak')
  cat('\n\n')
  
```



```{r partner_table ,results='asis', echo=FALSE}




kable(d$partners, "latex", booktabs = T,format.args = list(big.mark = ",")) %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 4) %>% 
  column_spec(3:ncol(d$partners),width = "0.33in")

```
